item.description:
$1 Oysters Cocktail Party and Surfboard Demo at Russell House Tavern!

This is going to be a really fun night: meet local surfers, sip a delicious cocktail, eat local $1 oysters, and WIN A SURFBOARD ... All are welcome!

WIN A SURFBOARD, SURF LESSONS & SUP TOUR!
$10 suggested "door fee" gets you a 100% recycled Wax Buddy wax comb and the chance to win a ton of donated prizes: custom shaped surfboard by Monroe Surf Company, wood handplanes from Grain, Vec and Crooked, shaping lessons by Green Lightning, SUP lessons and tours from Cape Ann SUP, and more!

No donation or purchase necessary to attend or enter to win prizes. Please just come and show your support for local shapers doing their part to make the surf industry more sustainable. 

SUSTAINABLE SURFBOARD DEMO
In our private room off the main bar, local shapers will demo their sustainable surfboards made with wood and recycled materials.

SPECIAL GUESTS AND EVENT SPONSORS
Grain Surfboards, Vec Surfboards, Crooked Blanks, Monroe Surf Company, Cape Ann SUP, Green Lightning Surfboards, Endless Wave Surf Shop, Change is Simple, and more to come!

This party is 100% all volunteer effort. Co-hosted by the Surfing Meetup group and the Mass Surfrider Foundation, all proceeds will fund a new initiate by CetoSurf.com to promote sustainable surf products.

About Ceto: CetoSurf.com welcomes surfers of all ages, abilities and wave riding styles who share a passion for the ocean, fun and friendship. By connecting and informing surfers, Ceto seeks to promote a healthy ocean environment and a more sustainable surf industry.

Summer 2011 oyster party - so fun - let's do it again!
item.name: $1 Oysters Cocktail Party at Russell House Tavern
